http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/terse.definition: Short label for a concept, often omitting text that should be inferable when the concept is reported in the context of other related concepts.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/terse.label: terseLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/verbo.definition: Extended label for a concept, making sure not to omit text that is required to enable the label to be understood on a stand alone basis.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/verbo.label: verboseLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/posit.definition: Standard label for a concept when the value of the concept is positive.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/posit.label: positiveLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/posit.definition: Terse label for a concept when the value of the concept is positive.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/posit.label: positiveTerseLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/posit.definition: Verbose label for a concept when the value of the concept is positive.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/posit.label: positiveVerboseLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/zeroL.definition: Standard label of a concept when the value of the concept is negative.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/zeroL.label: zeroLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/zeroT.definition: Terse label of a concept when the value of the concept is negative.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/zeroT.label: zeroTerseLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/zeroV.definition: Verbose label of a concept when the value of the concept is negative.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/zeroV.label: zeroVerboseLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/negat.definition: Standard label of a concept when the value of the concept is negative.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/negat.label: negativeLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/negat.definition: Terse label of a concept when the value of the concept is negative.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/negat.label: negativeTerseLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/negat.definition: Verbose label of a concept when the value of the concept is negative.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/negat.label: negativeVerboseLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/total.definition: The label for a concept for use in presenting values associated with the concept when it is being reported as the total of a set of other values.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/total.label: totalLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/perio.definition: The label for a concept with instantaneous="true" for use in presenting values associated with the concept when it is being report as a beginning of period value.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/perio.label: periodStartLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/perio.definition: The label for a concept with instantaneous="true" for use in presenting values associated with the concept when it is being reported as an end of period value.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/perio.label: periodEndLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/docum.definition: Documentation of a concept, providing an explanation of its meaning and its appropriate usage and any other documentation deemed necessary.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/docum.label: documentation

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/defin.definition: A precise definition of a concept, providing an explanation of its meaning and its appropriate usage.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/defin.label: definitionGuidance

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/discl.definition: An explanation of the disclosure requirements relating to the concept. Indicates whether the disclosure is mandatory (i.e. prescribed by authoritative literature), recommended (i.e. encouraged by authoritative literature), common practice (i.e. not prescribed by authoritative literature, but disclosure is common place), or structural completeness (i.e. merely included to complete the structure of the taxonomy).
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/discl.label: disclosureGuidance

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/prese.definition: An explanation of the rules guiding presentation (placement and/or labeling) of this concept in the context of other concepts in one or more specific types of business reports. For example, "Net Surplus should be disclosed on the face of the Profit and Loss statement".
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/prese.label: presentationGuidance

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/place.definition: An explanation of the rules guiding placement of this concept in the context of other concepts in one or more specific types of business reporting.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/place.label: placementGuidance

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/measu.definition: An explanation of the method(s) required to be used when measuring values associated with this concept in business reports.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/measu.label: measurementGuidance

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/comme.definition: Any other general commentary on the concept that assists in determining definition, disclosure, measurement, presentation or usage.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/comme.label: commentaryGuidance

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/examp.definition: An example of the type of information intended to be captured by the concept.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2003\/role\/examp.label: exampleGuidance

http:\/\/xbrlsite.azurewebsites.net\/201.definition: Label indicating a concept representing the value that was originally stated.
http:\/\/xbrlsite.azurewebsites.net\/201.label: originallyStatedLabel

http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2006\/role\/resta.definition: The label for a concept when presenting values that have been restated from their value as originally reported.
http:\/\/www.xbrl.org\/2006\/role\/resta.label: restatedLabel

http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.definition: Label used for a negative value at the beginning of the period. For example, "Deficit at the beginning of the period".
http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.label: periodStartNegativeLabel

http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.definition: Label used for a negative value at the end of the period. For example, "Deficit at the end of the period".
http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.label: periodEndNegativeLabel

http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.definition: Label used for a positive value or negative value. For example, "Operating profit or operating loss"
http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.label: positiveOrNegativeLabel

http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.definition: Label used for a positive value or negative value at the beginning of the period. For example, "Surplus at the beginning of the period and deficit at the beginning of the period".
http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.label: periodStartPositiveOrNegativeLabel

http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.definition: Label used for a positive value or negative value at the end of the period. For example, "Surplus at the end of the period and deficit at the end of the period".
http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.label: periodEndPositiveOrNegativeLabel

http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.definition: Footnote that shows note number at the beginning of the period.
http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.label: NotesNumberPeriodStart

http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.definition: Footnote that shows note number at the end of the period.
http:\/\/info.edinet-fsa.go.jp\/jp\/fr\/.label: NotesNumberPeriodEnd
